greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating Jacobsthal triangle read by rows (second version).
link: Kyu-Hwan Lee, Se-jin Oh, Catalan triangle numbers and binomial coefficients, arXiv:1601.06685 [math.CO], 2016.
formula: T(i, j) = A220074(i, i-j). See (3.7) in arxiv link. - _Michel Marcus_, Jun 17 2017
mathematica: Table[T[i, j], {i, 0, 11}, {j, 0, i}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 06 2018 *)
program: (PARI) \\ using arxiv (3.1) and (3.7) formulas where A is A220074 and B is this sequence
tabl(nn) = for (i=0, nn, for (j=0, i, print1(B(i,j), ", ")); print()); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 17 2017
xref: See A112468, A112555 and A108561 for other versions.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 07 2016
